add-point-intent -t IPV4 -p 200 SwitchId/InPort SwitchId/OutPort

## Client1 com Client2

add-point-intent -p 200 of:0000000000000001/3 of:0000000000000001/1

add-point-intent -p 200 of:0000000000000001/1 of:0000000000000002/1

add-point-intent -p 200 of:0000000000000002/1 of:0000000000000002/3

add-point-intent -p 200 of:0000000000000002/3 of:0000000000000002/1

add-point-intent -p 200 of:0000000000000002/1 of:0000000000000001/1

add-point-intent -p 200 of:0000000000000001/1 of:0000000000000001/3


## Server1 com Server2

add-point-intent -p 500 of:0000000000000001/4 of:0000000000000001/1

add-point-intent -p 500 of:0000000000000002/1 of:0000000000000002/4


## Server2 com Server3

add-point-intent -p 500 of:0000000000000002/4 of:0000000000000002/2

add-point-intent -p 500 of:0000000000000003/2 of:0000000000000003/4

## Server3 com Server 1

add-point-intent -p 500 of:0000000000000003/4 of:0000000000000001/4
